description: This file defines the ReportsScreen widget, which is a Flutter UI screen that displays various charts related to spending reports. It imports chart widgets and composes a UI with a Scaffold, AppBar, and ListView containing different chart widgets.

classes.name: ReportsScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatelessWidget that displays a report page with different spending charts using imported chart widgets.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ReportsScreen, including Scaffold, AppBar, and ListView with chart widgets.
